overview: Dr. Luo’s research interests focus on machine learning and systems informatics and their application to health outcomes, decision support, interpretable and credible models at both the individual and community levels for precision medicine, health equity, and healthcare quality. He will be joining the Health Outcomes & Behavior Program to advance applications of AI/ML in areas related to improving cancer outcomes through social determinants and reducing care disparity through implementation of Fair AI.
research_interests:
